mapper.select:
select m.MEMBERNO, m.KNAME, m.password, a.ASSOCIATIONNAME, m.PICIMG, (select LEADERPOSITIONNAME from leaderpositioncode lp where lp.LEADERPOSITIONCODE1 = l.LEADERPOSITIONCODE1 and lp.LEADERPOSITIONCODE2 = l.LEADERPOSITIONCODE2) as LEADERPOSITIONNAME, EMPLOYEEY, ifnull((select ADMINY from leader a where a.MEMBERNO = #{MEMBERNO} and left(a.STARTDAY, 4) = #{YEAR}), "N") as ADMINY from member m inner join leader l on m.MEMBERNO = l.MEMBERNO left outer join associationcode a on a.ASSOCIATIONCODE = l.ASSOCIATIONCODE where m.MEMBERNO = #{MEMBERNO}
order by l.STARTDAY desc limit 1 offset 0;
